doc:
Conrad Bain https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conrad_Bain 0 Conrad Stafford Bain (February 4, 1923 – January 14, 2013) was a Canadian/American actor and comedian and character actor. His television credits include a leading role as Phillip Drummond in the sitcom Diff'rent Strokes and as Dr. Arthur Harmon on Maude. Conrad_Stafford_Bain ( February_4_,_1923 – January_14_,_2013 ) was a_Canadian/American_actor and comedian_and_character_actor . His_television_credits include a_leading_role as Phillip_Drummond in the_sitcom_Diff'rent_Strokes and as Dr._Arthur_Harmon on Maude .
